title: Enterprise Leadership
description: A sustained climb from Software Engineering, R&D, & Data Science to Enterprise & Operations Management and Agile Coaching. Building resilient teams, scalable operations, and developing future leaders over years, not quarters.

title: Full-Stack Development & Scrum Master
description: High-velocity delivery across multiple clients and tech stacks. Rapid iterations, tight deadlines, and continuous learning at startup pace.

title: MBA
description: An intensive two-year push while working full-time. Compressed learning in marketing and leadership. International immersion project in Sweden and Ghana.

title: Systems Analysis
description: Four years of deep-dive analysis and methodical problem-solving. Patience and precision that built a lasting technical foundation.

title: BS Mathematics
description: The long game: initial quantitative training. Foundational thinking that still pays dividends today.
